name: ABYSS Finances (bank, loans, investments and more)
author: Acuru
description:
[h1]What this mod do?[/h1]
Most mod options are avaible throught "click" menu -> Bank.

[b]Bank Account[/b]
You can deposit money, and intrest every month.

Interest rate will degrade over time - it starts on about 15% (yearly), and decrease to about
